message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. We understand its value to you stands at $1200000. Considering this, we are offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $1350000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. We hope you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how our product can enhance your needs. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are confident that once you experience the benefits, you will agree that this is a fair and generous offer.
